name: Puzzle Bloc Invasion
description: Puzzle Bloc Invasion is a genre shifting, classic arcade shooter built around powering up your shot, igniting color combos, and clearing out levels as quickly and efficiently as possible (for maximum reward).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intell HD Graphics 2000 (or equivalent) Storage: 60 MB available space Additional Notes: The above was tested and able to maintain 60fps @1080p.
